With such a low quality effort, no additional caravans will be attracted to our settlement...
LanguageData.VME_UnexcitingTradingFair.stages.0.label: unexciting trading fair
LanguageData.VME_UnexcitingTradingFair.stages.0.descr: Some exciting transactions took place, but the majority of it was boring business talk.
LanguageData.VME_WellOrganizedTradingFair.stages.0.de: There was a lot of back and forth and networking.
LanguageData.VME_WondrousTradingFair.stages.0.label: wondrous trading fair
LanguageData.VME_WondrousTradingFair.stages.0.descrip: We discussed exciting and innovative economical paradigms, and our settlement will be renowned as a center of finance learning.
LanguageData.VME_CheapTradingFair.stages.0.label: we tried to be cheap
LanguageData.VME_CheapTradingFair.stages.0.descriptio: We tried to organize a trading fair without spending any money on it. It is shameful to be so cheap.
